Containers.Requires: Radeon-TOP, Intel-GPU-TOP or Nvidia Driver Installed
Containers.Name: NVTOP
Containers.Description: NVTOP stands for Neat Videocard TOP, a (h)top like task monitor for AMD, Intel and NVIDIA GPUs. It can handle multiple GPUs and print information about them in a htop familiar way. This Plugin is based on: https://github.com/Syllo/nvtop
